snippet.title: Lost Grimoires 2: Shard of Mystery
snippet.description:
Coming soon on PS4 and Xbox One!

When Prince Fern goes missing with a mysterious girl just days before his coronation, only one person in the king’s court can find him. The teacher, spy, and advisor of House Griff is tasked with tracking him down and bringing him home safe in time for the coronation. The quest to find the heir will lead the protagonist through dreamlike woods full of magical places and creatures, and challenge her with intricate hidden object puzzles and elaborate labyrinths. The teacher will also encounter some unusual characters and face the malicious witch Drosera as she discovers the secret of the curse that befell the kingdom. Using the knowledge of alchemical arcana, the protectress will do everything in her power to save Prince Fern from the looming threat to his life. Will she succeed? The future of the kingdom is in your hands!
